column1: Weighted MRI size (128, 256, 1) in T2, exhibiting the head of a man of 37 years old, of sagittal section n°111 starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. We see clearly: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 5368.3594 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4263.5742 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 325.6348 mm³, the white matter of left hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 605.1270 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 1603.1250 mm³, the left thalamus of volume 440.3320 mm³, the left caudate nucleus of volume 312.4512 mm³, the left putamen of volume 61.9629 mm³, the left globus pallidus of volume 79.1016 mm³, the brainstem of volume 228.0762 mm³, the left hippocampus of volume 31.6406 mm³, the left amygdala of volume 50.0977 mm³, the left nucleus accumbens of volume 1.3184 mm³ and the left ventral diencephalon of volume 147.6562 mm³.
